parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF 11240015), which is strongly indicative of electoral propaganda material.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "Elena Lasconi" and promotes her candidacy for president, along with the USR party.  This directly refers to a specific candidate participating in the elections, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, the content is clearly intended to reach a wide audience, not just a select few. This satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to support Elena Lasconi and the USR party. The call to action "Votează USR! Votează echipa Elena Lasconi!" explicitly aims to influence voting behavior. This clearly fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present information in a journalistic manner. It lacks objectivity and is purely promotional in nature, advocating for a specific candidate.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a direct appeal for votes, exceeding the bounds of personal expression.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>3944305055814200</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific candidate (Elena Lasconi), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to choose USR. The inclusion of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  The post's timing is also crucial; even if the general election period has ended, the specific timeframe of this post needs to be checked against the legal deadlines for electoral propaganda.  If this post was published after the legal deadline for electoral propaganda, it constitutes a violation.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate>
    <name>Elena Lasconi</name>
    <impact>POSITIVE</impact>
  </candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>USR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
USR Maramureș, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu ID-ul postării 3944305055814200, care promovează candidatul Elena Lasconi și Partidul USR, îndemnând la vot prin fraza „Votează USR! Votează echipa Elena Lasconi!”, având ca efect electoral influențarea votului în favoarea candidatei menționate. Prezența numărului CMF 11240015 confirmă natura de propagandă electorală a postării.  Această postare, având în vedere conținutul său explicit electoral și îndemnul direct la vot, constituie propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
